sign_up_screen.we_are: At PeerPromote, we are your digital manager that will help you connect with brands looking for your content. Complete your user profile to access available offers.

sign_up_screen.complete_info: To help you connect with brands, we need to complete your contact information
sign_up_screen.all_ready: All set, verify your information to continue
sign_up_screen.complete: , you have completed your user profile. Now you can explore offers from real brands looking for promotion. Remember, in order to contact them, you need to complete your professional profile.
